headline: 3 No-Brainer Dividend Stocks to Buy and Hold for Decades to Come
summary: In contrast, investors may expect dividend-paying companies to steadily boost their earnings and payouts over time, rewarding them with a one-two punch of passive income and capital gains.  Here's why Lockheed Martin (NYSE: LMT), American Water Works (NYSE: AWK), and Watsco (NYSE: WSO) stand out as ultra-reliable dividend stocks to buy now.  Daniel Foelber (Lockheed Martin): Defense companies that contract with the U.S. government and its allies can be highly reliable cash cows that generate stable income no matter what the economy is doing.
